event.title: includes all of Brown and Edmunds counties and has a population of 40,602 in 2010

data.event: Aberdeen is the principal city of the Aberdeen Micropolitan Statistical Area, which includes all of Brown and Edmunds counties and has a population of 40,602 in 2010.
This town was established on June 15, 1879.
The town was settled in 1880, and incorporated in 1882.
The town was settled in 1880, and incorporated in 1882.
